db:abstract.db:para: The example implements a Modbus master application.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += serialbus serialport widgets
TARGET = modbusmaster TEMPLATE = app CONFIG += c++11
SOURCES += main.cpp\ mainwindow.cpp \ settingsdialog.cpp \ writeregistermodel.cpp

FORMS += mainwindow.ui \ settingsdialog.ui
RESOURCES += \ master.qrc
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/serialbus/modbus/master INSTALLS += target
